title: Business Practical Skills Enhancement: Self-Regulated Learning for Improved Mathematics Achievement in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners enhance mathematics problem-solving skills by 20% or more using self-regulated learning strategies in online learning environments
Learners increase mathematics learning goal achievement rates by 30% through the application of self-efficacy enhancement techniques

Learners can derive 3 or more latent variables and 5 or more measurement variables from business/HR field data (e.g., organizational commitment, job satisfaction survey data) using SEM tools (AMOS, R lavaan, etc.), and produce a causal analysis report meeting model fit indices (CFI > 0.9, RMSEA < 0.08)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
